author: Dark Priest
name: The Good, The Bad, The Demon.
bootlegger: [There might be 0-2 Demons. If there are 2 then one is good and the other is evil.]
[If there is no evil demon there is +1 minion.]
The good demon does not learn their minions. Minion receive normal starting info and if the demon is good.
If the demon is good, Cerenovus may make a player mad as the demon.
